title: A Bombshell Tip I Was Given (Ep 1410)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the way to immediately get to the bottom of what happened on election night in that suspicious videotape. I also address the explosive allegations about a Chinese government plot covered in a new Axios report, and an explosive tip I was given. 

News Picks:


An explosive story in Axios about a massive Chinese government influence operation in the United States.


Texas sues Georgia, Michigan, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin over election procedures. 

An excellent piece about the suspicious Georgia election night video. 

Leaked documents out of Los Angeles portend a troubling new future.


Nancy Pelosi is in trouble.  


Teacher’s Unions now claiming it’s “racist” and “sexist” to open schools. 

“Judge” Sullivan continues to harass General Flynn.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
